snippet.title: SPIRIT MANCER - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Spirit Mancer is coming to PC, Nintendo Switch & PS5 on NOVEMBER 7th! 🎉 Wishlist the funniest hack-and-slash ever: https://www.spiritmancer.com What do you do when you can't defeat your enemies alone? You recruit allies! And if you're wondering how, we've got the perfect gameplay trailer for you! 🐷

💥 What SPIRIT MANCER is about?
Slash, Shoot and Break demons. Capture their spirits and summon them out into your battle in the beautiful yet dangerous world of Inferno. Fight against hordes of demons and stop the evil queen with the power of the Spirit Mancer

Follow us:
🧡 Twitter: https://x.com/spirit_mancer
💜 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dearvillagers/
🧡 Discord: https://discord.gg/dearvillagers
💜 Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dearvillagers
🧡 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SpiritMancer.GAME

#deckbuilding #hackandslash
